description.narrative: By 2020, educational structures and authorities at central and decentralized level have enhanced capacity to ensure effective governance of basic education system and quality learning for children aged 3-16 years.

mailing-address.narrative: 18 Rue Pierre & Marie Currie Marcory Zone IV Boite Postale 443 Abidjan 04 Côte d'Ivoire

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Digital learning materials and ICT in education

System strengthening - curricula and learning materials design (excluding early-learning / pre-primary)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, educational structures and authorities at central and decentralized level have enhanced capacity to ensure effective governance of basic education system and quality learning for children aged 3-16 years.

description.narrative: In 2019, the Country Office provided technical and financial support to implement contract-based performance schemes aimed at reinforcing accountability mechanisms, at both the central and decentralized levels of the education system. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/02/2020

title.narrative: Service Delivery - Children provided with individual (one-per-child) education/early learning materials through UNICEF-supported programmes - see guidance
Existence of an effective national system for learning outcomes, including early learning
